body.p: Inclosed you will find a letter to Govr MaGoffin in behalf of Mr. Powell recently condemned for the stealing of a carpet Bag at Paducah Ky. and request you to interest yourself in behalf of the unfortunate man. I have not time to enlarge upon matters but will write you in a short time. Our Election for delegates, comes off Saturday and a I think, Secession will be defeated though, I am for Secession, at the earliest moment myself.-

Grant Green Esqr
Auditor
Frankfort
Ky_
